original: prācīna vyakaraṇa tantre vācanikānyatra pāṇinīyatantre jñapakanyāyasiddāni bhaṣyavārtikayorupanibaddāni yāni paribhaṣārūpaṇi tāni vyākhyāsyante/

original: viśeṣasyānyatarādyartharūpasya vyākhyānāt śiṣṭakṛtāt pratipattiḥ niśchayo yataḥ sandehācchāstramalakṣaṇamananuṣṭāpakaṃ lakṣaṇamalakṣaṇaṃ tathā

original: tattadvākyārthabodhe jāte ' bhaviṣyati kiñcidanena prayojanam ' iti jñānamātreṇa santuṣyad yathāśrutagrāhipratipatrapekṣo 'yaṃ pakṣa īdūdetsūtre

original: kecittu - paribhaṣāviṣaye tasminnityādi vākyārthabodhe saptamīnirdeśādikveti paryālocanāyāṃ

etat eva abhipretya adhikāraḥ nāma tri prakāraḥ

original: yathā - 'pradīpaḥ suprajvalitaḥ sarvaṃ veśmābhijvalayati' iti 'ṣaṣṭīsthane' iti sūtre bhāṣya uktam/

adhikāra śabdena pārārthyāt paribhāṣā api ucyate

original: dīpo yathā - prabhādvārā sarvagṛhaprakāśaka evametatsvabuddhijananadvārā sarvaśāstropakārakamiti tattātparyam/

etat ca pakṣa dvaya sādhāraṇam bhāṣyam

original: tatraitāvān viśeṣaḥ - yatoddeśe parbhāṣādeśe sarvavidhisūtrabuddhāvātmabhedaṃ parikalpya tairekavākyatayā paribhāṣāṇām/
analyzed: tatra etāvān viśeṣaḥ yatas uddeśe sarva vidhi sūtra buddhau ātma bhedam parikalpya taiḥ eka vākya tayā paribhāṣāṇām

yatas uddeśe pradhānāni ātma saṃskārāya sannidhīyamānāni guṇa bhedam prayuñjate eti

original: atra ekadeśastha ityanena tatra tatra buddhāvapi taddeśasthatvaṃ vārayati,

yathā vyavaharttṝṇām kārya artham aneka deśa gamane na tad tad deśīya tva vyavahāraḥ

original: tadvanniṣedhavākyānāmapi niṣedhyaviśeṣākāṅkṣatvādvidhyekavākyatayaivānvaya iti paribhāṣāsādṛśyātparibhāṣātvena vyavahāraḥ 'kiṅiti ca' ityatra
analyzed: tadvat niṣedha vākyānām api niṣedhya viśeṣa ākāṅkṣa tvāt vidhi ekavākyatayā eva anvayaḥ iti paribhāṣā sādṛśyāt paribhāṣā tvena vyavahāraḥ kiṅ iti ca iti atra

original: tatraikavākyatā paryudāsena prasajya pratiṣedhe 'pi tena saha vākyārthabodhamātreṇaikavākyatā vyavahāraḥ//
analyzed: tatra eka vākya tā paryudāsena prasajya pratiṣedhe tena saha vākya artha bodha mātreṇa eka vākya tā vyavahāraḥ
saṃjñā śāstrasya tu kārya kāla pakṣe na pṛthak vākya artha bodhaḥ
kintu pradeśa vākyena saha eva
atas eva aṇo pragṛhyasya iti etat ekavākya tā āpannāt a somāt iti etat prati na mutvā ādi asiddham
asiddha tvasya kārya artha tayā kārya jñāna uttaram eva tad pravṛttiḥ
kārya jñānam ca pradeśaḥ eva iti tad deśa stha asiddha tvāt pūrva grahaṇena agrahāt

original: evaṃ tadbodhottarameva virodhapratisandhānañceti tatratyaparatvena vipratiṣedhasūtrapravṛttau bījam/

original: ata eva kāryakālapakṣe“ayādibhyaḥ paraiva pragṛhya saṃjñā“iti 'adasomāt'
analyzed: atas eva kārya kāla pakṣe aya ādibhyaḥ parā eva pragṛhya saṃjñā iti a t a somāt
iti sūtre bhāṣya uktam

original: ākaḍārādhikārasthabhapadasaṃjñāviśaye tu yathoddeśapakṣa eveti tatratyaparatvenaiva bādhyabhādhakabhāvaḥ/
analyzed: ākaḍāra adhikāra stha bha pada saṃjñā viśaye tu yathā uddeśa pakṣe evā iti tatratya paratvena eva bādhya bhādhaka bhāvaḥ
pada ādi saṃjñanām tatra
jāta śakti grahaṇā iva tripādyam api vyavahāraḥ
atas eva pūrvatra asiddham iti sūtre paribhāṣāṇām eva tri pādyām apravṛttim āśaṅkya

yathā uddeśa pakṣaḥ pragṛhya saṃjñā prakaraṇe bhāṣye

original: kāryakālamityasya ca kāryeṇa kālyate svasannidhiṃ prāpyata ityarthaḥ/
analyzed: kārya kālam iti asya ca kāryeṇa kālyate sva sannidhim prāpyate iti arthaḥ

original: ata eva 'pūrvatrāsiddham' iti sūtre bhāṣye tripādyā asiddhatvāttatra sapādasaptādyāyīstha paribhāṣāṇāṃ apravṛttimāśaṅkya yadyapīdaṃ tatrāsiddhaṃ  #
analyzed: atas eva pūrvatra asiddham iti sūtre bhāṣye tripādyāḥ asiddha tvāt tatra paribhāṣāṇām apravṛttim āśaṅkya yadi api idam tatra asiddham

original: tāvatāpyasiddhirityabhiprāyake kathamiti praśne-'kāryakālaṃ saṃjñāparibhāṣam' yatra kāryaṃ tatropasthitaṃ draṣṭavyamityuktam/

original: “padadvayasambandhivarṇadvayāpekṣaṃ bahiraṅgam“iti 'preddhaḥ' ityādau guṇo bahiraṅga iti granthena“na dhātu lopa“iti sūtre“saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ“iti  #

yat tu ṣatva grahaṇam api jñāpakam

original: tanna, iṇaḥ pūrvapadasambandhitvena ṣatvasyāpi padadvaya sambandhivarṇadvayāpekṣatvenobhayoḥ samatvāt/

eka ādeśasya para ādi tvena os icat ityasya pada tvena pada ādi tva abhāvāt nasāt pada ādyoḥ iti anena niṣedhaḥ

original: ata eva“chvoḥ“iti sūtre 'avaśyamatra tugabhāvārtho yatnaḥ kāryaḥ' antaraṅgatvāddhi tuk prāpnoti' iti bhāṣye uktam/

original: taduktam“asiddhavat“sūtre kaiyaṭena 'nimittāpāye naimittikasyāpyapāyaḥ' iti paribhāṣāyāḥ 'bhaṣyakṛtānāśrayaṇāt' iti/

original: evamatra tatpravṛtyuttaraṃ cāritārthye 'pi tadavyāpto 'vakśo nāstīti samameva/

original: 'apavādo yadyanyatra caritārthaḥ' iti nyāyasya tu nātra praptiḥ,

original: anyathā“karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām“iti striyāmeva vidhānāt kiṃ tena?

original: nanu 'supathī nagarī' iti“yuvoranākau“iti sūtrabhāṣyodāhṛte“inaḥ striyām“iti kap syāt ata āha --

original: ata eva 'grāmaṇi kulam' ityādau napuṃsakahrasvatve 'pi“piti kṛti“iti tuk na/
analyzed: atas eva grāmaṇi kulam ityādau napuṃsaka hrasva tve pipiti kṛti iti tuk na
prātipadika a c anta tva sannipātena jātasya hrasvasya tad avidhāyaka tvāt
tuki a c anta tva vighātaḥ spaṣṭaḥ eva
na ca artha āśraya tvena hrasvasya bahiraṅga tayā asiddha tvam
artha kṛta bahiraṅga tva anāśrayaṇasya ukta tvāt
kiñca ṣatva tukoḥ asiddhaḥ iti etad balāt kṛti tuk grahaṇāt ca tuk vidhau bahiraṅga paribhāṣāyāḥ apravṛtteḥ

original: -- 'na hi pratyayaḥ pūrva para sannipāta nimittakaḥ,

original: sa eva ca sannipāta śabdena gṛhyata iti matvā na pratyayaḥ sannipātanimittakaḥ iti śaṅkāyāṃ tadabhyupetyaivāṅgasaṃjñā tarhyanimittaṃ syādityekadeśinoktam'  #

iti na tad bhāṣya virodhaḥ

original: vainateyaḥ' ityādāvapyaṅgasaṃjñāyā lopanimittatvānāpatyā varṇāśraya ityasya vaiyarthayam/
analyzed: vainateyaḥ ityādau api aṅga saṃjñāyāḥ lopa nimitta tva anāpatyā varṇa āśrayaḥ iti asya vaiyarthayam
grāmaṇi kulam grāmaṇi putraḥ ityādau uttara pada nimittake hrasva tve yathā kathañcid

atas eva paribhāṣā phala tvena idam uktam kṛt m e c antaḥ iti sūtre vārttika kṛtā iti kecid

original: na ca yañāditvasāpekṣadīrghasya bahiraṅgatayāsiddhatvānnātra sannipātavighāta iti vācyam,

āropita asiddha tve pi vastutas tad vighātasya jāyamāna tvena etad pravṛtteḥ

original: kiñcāntaraṅge kartavye bahiraṅgasyāsiddhatve 'pi tatra kṛte tasyāsiddhatve mānābhāḥ/
analyzed: kiñca antaraṅge kartavye bahiraṅgasya asiddha tve tatra kṛte tasya asiddha tve māna ābhāḥ
kiñca atideśika sannipāta vighāta abhāvam ādāya etad apravṛttau gauri ityādau sambuddhi lope pi sthāniva tvena hrasva nimitta sannipāta vighāta abhāvāt
tatra etasya ativyāpti para kṛt m e c antaḥ iti sūtra stha bhāṣya asaṅgatiḥ
sannipātasya aśāstrīya tvāt na atra sthāniva tvam iti ced
tarhi atra asiddhatvam api katham iti vibhāvya
aśāstrīye siddha tva apravṛtteḥ sūtre kaiyaṭena spaṣṭam ukta tvāt
evam ca pūrvatra asiddhīye kārye etad paribhāṣā pravṛttiḥ bhavati eva iti ced
na kaṣṭāya iti nirdeśena etasyāḥ anitya tvāt
yayoḥ sannipātasya vighātakam śāstram
tayoḥ sannipāta nimittaka vidhau upādānam apekṣitam iti tu na agrahaḥ

original: ata eva 'dākṣiḥ' ityatrākārāntaprakṛtīñsannipātanimittāṅgasaṃjñānayā paribhāṣayāllopasya nimittaṃ na syādityāśaṅkyānityatvena samāhitam,

kṛt m e c antaḥ iti sūtre bhāṣye

ādhaye ityādau avyaya saṃjñāyāḥ anayā paribhāṣayā

avyaya tvam tu syāt eva

etena atra akac syāt iti apāstam

original: atra ca“bilvakādibhyaśchasya luk“iti sūtrasthaṃ chagrahaṇaṃ jñāpakam/

original: taddhi chamātrasya lugbodhana dvārā kuko 'nivṛttiryathā syādityartham/

original: kṛta kugāgamānaḍādyantargatā bilvādaya eva tatra nirdiṣṭā bilvakādiśabdena/

kṛta kuga āgama anuvāda sāmarthyāt eva tad anivṛtti siddheḥ
anyathā bilva ādibhyaḥ iti eva vadet

original: lakṣaṇapratipadoktaparibhāṣayā bilvādipuraskāreṇa vihitapratyayasyaiva lugvidhānānnātiprasaṅga iti vācyam,

yat tuṇāviṣṭavat iti anena puṃvat tva vidhānam etat anitya tva jñāpana artham

āha

bhrauṇa hatye ta tva nipātanam asyāḥ jñāpakam

original: 'dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānam' iti pāṭhastu 'prasṛḍbhiḥ' ityādau“anudāttasya cardupadhasya“ityāmāpādanena bhāṣye dūṣitaḥ/
analyzed: dhātoḥ sva rūpa grahaṇe tad pratyaye kārya vijñānam iti pāṭhaḥ tu prasṛḍbhiḥ ityādau anudāttasya ca ṛ t upadhasya etyām āpādanena bhāṣye dūṣitaḥ
yat kāryam pratyaya nimittam tatra iyam vyavasthāpikā

iyaṅ ādi vidhau tu na eṣā
na bhū sudhiyoḥ iti niṣedhena anitya tvāt
mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ iti atra bhāṣye spaṣṭā

original: iccakaiḥ' ityādau sarvanāvyayasaṃjñe na syātām, ata āha --

original: nanu“gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ“iti sico luk 'apāsīta' ityādau pāterapi syāt, ata āha --

original: asyāñca jñāpakaḥ“svarati sūti“iti sūtre sūṅiti vaktavye sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśa iti
analyzed: asyām ca jñāpakaḥ svarati sūti iti sūtre sūṅ iti vaktavye sūti sūyatyoḥ pṛthak nirdeśaḥ iti
kaiyaṭaḥ tat na
sāhacaryāt a luk vikaraṇasya eva grahaṇe prāpte pṛthak nirdeśasya tad jñāpaka tva asambhavāt
dhvanitā ca iyam paribhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti atra bhāṣye
tatra hi viditaḥ iti prayoge niṣedham āśaṅkya yad upādeḥ vibhāṣā

original: tadupāderniṣedhaḥ“vibhāṣā gamahanavidaviśām“iti sūtre 'śavikaraṇasya gpahaṇaṃ lugvikaraṇaścāyam' ityuktam/
analyzed: tad upādeḥ niṣedhaḥ vibhāṣā gama hana vida viśām iti sūtre śa vikaraṇasya luk vikaraṇaḥ ca ayam iti uktam
tatra caḥ hetau
yataḥ yaṃluk vikaraṇaḥ
a taḥ viśi sāhacaryāt śavi karaṇasya grahaṇam
na tu hani sāhacaryāt asya api
etad paribhāṣā virodhāt iti tad āśayaḥ
atas eva paribhāṣāyām luk vikaraṇasya eva iti na uktam

original: kaṇṭhatastu bhāṣye eṣā kvāpi na paṭhitā/
analyzed: kaṇṭhatas tu bhāṣye eṣā kvāpi na paṭhitā

original: 'gātisthā' iti sūtre 'pibatergrahaṇam kartavyam' iti vārtikakṛtā 'sarvatraiva pāgrahaṇe 'lugvikaraṇasya gpahaṇam' iti bhāṣyakṛtā coktam/

original: nanu 'prajighāyayiṣati' ityādau“heracaṅi“iti vidhīyamānaṃ kutvaṃ na syāt ata āha --

prakṛti grahaṇe ṇi adhikasya api grahaṇam

iyam ca kutva viṣayā eva
heḥ a c ṅi iti sūtre bhāṣye

original: nanu 'yuṣmabhyam' ityādau 'bhyasaḥ' ityatra bhyamiti cchede bhyaso bhyami kṛte 'ntyalope etvaṃ syāt, ata āha --

original: tasmin sati punaranyasyāṅgakāryasya vṛttau pravṛttāvavidhānaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ/

original: ata eva“jñājanorjā” “jyādādīyasaḥ“iti sūtrayorenāṃ jñāpayitvā kiṃ prayojanamiti praśne pibaterguṇapratiṣedha uktaḥ,
analyzed: atas sūtrayoḥ enām jñāpayitvā kim prayojanam iti praśne pibateḥ guṇa pratiṣedhaḥ uktaḥ
sa na vaktavyaḥ
iti eva prayojanam uktam
na tu lakṣya siddhi rūpam
tat uktam bhyasaḥ bhyam iti atra iti chedaḥ

original: “śeṣe lopaḥ“cāntyalopa eva“ato guṇe“iti pararūpeṇa siddham 'yuṣmabhyam' ityanyatra nirūpitam/
analyzed: śeṣe lopaḥ ca antya lopaḥ eva atas guṇe iti para rūpeṇa siddham yuṣmabhyam iti anyatra nirūpitam

original: evañca sūtradvayasthametajjñāpanaparaṃ bhāṣyam“bhyaso bhyam“iti sūtrasthaṃ ca bhāṣyamekadeśyuktirityāhuḥ//

āgama śāstram anityam

original: tathā tanādipāṭhādeva siddhe“tanādikṛñbhyaḥ“iti sūtre kṛñ grahaṇāt --

original: ata eva“yasyaca bhāvena“iti saptamyapekṣayādhikaraṇasaptamyā balavatvamanena nyāyena,

original: “namo variva“itisūtre 'namasyati devān' ityādau caturthī vāraṇāya bhāṣye upanyāsasyāsaṅgateśca//

original: nāṅgasya śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu tu gṛhyamāṇasyābhāvāt prakaraṇaprāptaṅgasyaiva viśeṣaṇam/

original: ata eva“vā napuṃsakasya“iti sūtre“vā śau“iti na kṛtam/

original: tatra napuṃsakagrahaṇaṃ hi gṛhyamāṇasya śatrantasyaiva napuṃsakatve yathā syāt,
analyzed: tatra napuṃsaka grahaṇam hi gṛhyamāṇasya śatṛ antasya eva napuṃsaka tve yathā syāt

original: 'bahavo dadato yeṣu tāni kulāni bahudadati' ityatra mā bhūt;

original: 'bahūni dadanti yeṣu te bahudadantaḥ' ityatra yathā syādityevamartham/
analyzed: bahūni dadanti yeṣu te bahu dadantaḥ iti atra yathā syāt iti evam artham

original: kecittu“aco rahābhyaṃ dve“ityatra śrutena rephasya nimittatvena yarantarbhāvādanumitena kāryitvaṃ bādhyata ityetadudāharaṇamāhuḥ, tat,

na takrakauṇḍinya nyāyena siddheḥ iti anyatra vistaraḥ

original: “traisvaryeṇa pāṭhaḥ“iti pakṣe tu jñāpakaparaṃ bhāṣyāmiti kaiyaṭādayaḥ/

original: atra vikārakṛto lakṣyabhedo neti“sici vṛddhiḥ“iti bhāṣyāt pratīyate/

u ñaḥ om iti atra ananunāsike eva uccāraṇīye vivakṣā bodhyā
pathi mathi ṛbhukṣām ityādau sthāni anurūpa tayā anunāsike eva uccāraṇīye niranunāsika uccāraṇāt tad vivakṣā

a bādhakāni api nipātanāni iti tu bhāṣya viruddham

ātva viṣaye eva ātmanepadam
prayoga sthānām eva anukaraṇasya ghu saṃjñā sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭa mukta tvāt iti anye
antyā api tatra tatra upadeśa grahaṇam kurvataḥ sūtrakṛtaḥ u vārtikakṛtaḥ ca a sammatā

original: 'iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣveva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu rūpamāśrīyate -- yatrāsyaitadrūpamiti,
analyzed: iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣu eva sānubandhaka grahaṇeṣu rūpam āśrīyate yatra asya etat rūpam iti
rūpa nirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam

original: tasmiṃśca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānāṃ prayogo nāstīti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayoga upāsyate,
analyzed: tasmin ca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate

original: 'ka upadeśo nāma' iti ghusaṃjñāsūtrastha bhāṣyeṇa prāyogikāsambhave tadgrahaṇamityarthasya lābhena bhāṣyāsammatā ca /
analyzed: kaḥ upadeśaḥ nāma iti ghusaṃjñā sūtra stha bhāṣyeṇa prāyogika asambhave tad grahaṇam iti arthasya lābhena bhāṣyā a sammatā ca
bhāṣye sānubandhaka ityādi prakṛta abhiprayeṇa

original: “dādeḥ“iti sūtre dādipadasyaupadeśikadāditvavati lakṣaṇeti na doṣa ityanyatra vistaraḥ//
analyzed: d ādeḥ iti sūtre d ādi padasya aupadeśika d ādi tvavati lakṣaṇā iti na doṣaḥ iti anyatra vistaraḥ

original: yadapi nanu 'ajarghā bebhidīti' ityādau tattadiguṇaprayuktā vikaraṇā yaṅluki syuḥ,
analyzed: yat api nanu ajarghā bebhidīti ityādau tad tad iguṇa prayuktāḥ vikaraṇāḥ yaṅ luki syuḥ

original: tathā yaṅluki 'bebhiditā' ityādau“ekācaḥ“itoṇ niṣedhaḥ syāt, ata āha --
analyzed: tathā yaṅ luki bebhiditā ityādau eka a caḥ itaḥ ṭ niṣedhaḥ syāt atas āha

original: śtipā śapānubandhena nirdiṣṭaṃ yad gaṇena ca /
analyzed: śtipā śapa anubandhena nirdiṣṭam yat gaṇena ca

original: yatraikājgrahaṇaṃ caiva pañcaitāni na yaṅluki // Paribh_130 //
analyzed: yatra eka a c grahaṇam ca eva pañca etāni na yaṅ luki
anubandha nirdeśaḥ dvidhā svarūpeṇa
ṅ itaḥ ityādi padena ca
hanti yāti vāti
sanīvantaḥ eti sūtre bhara iti
dīṅaḥ yu ḍ a ci anudāttaḥ ṅ itaḥ div ādibhyaḥ śyan eka a caḥ upadeśe iti udāharaṇāni
dvi tvam san ādi antāḥ iti bhū ādayaḥ iti dhātu tvam ca bhavati eva
guṇaḥ uyaṅ lukoḥ iti yī dibhiḥ nu sedha anitya tva kalpanāt
tena a c a c a ṛghāḥ ityādau bhavati

original: ata eva“śvoditaḥ“iti sūtre kaiyaṭe -- 'yatraikāj grahaṇaṃ kiñcit' iti pāṭhaḥ/
analyzed: atas sūtre kaiyaṭe yatra eka a c grahaṇam kiñcid iti pāṭhaḥ
eka a caḥ upadeśe
ṭan udāttā iti sūtre eka a c grahaṇena eka deśa anumatyā eṣā jñāpyate
anyathā upadeśe n kāca anudātta tvasya eva satvena tad vaiyarthyam spaṣṭam eva iti
tat api na bhāṣya anukta tvāt
eka a c grahaṇasya vadhi vyāvṛti artham āvaśyaka tvāt ca
na ca vadhis sthāni upadeśe ekā a c iva iti vācyam
sākṣāt upadeśa sambhavena etad viṣaye sthāni upadeśa agrahaṇāt
upadeśā tva avacchedena eka a c iti arthāt ca
kiñca uttara artham eka a c grahaṇam

original: ata eva 'jāgaritavān' ityādāvupadeśa ugantatvamādāya“śruyukaḥ kiti“itīṇ niṣedho na/
analyzed: atas eva jāgaritavān ityādau upadeśaḥ u k anta tvam ādāya śru yu kaḥ niṣedhaḥ na
tatra upadeśe iti anuvṛttiḥ śyaḥ stīrṇam ityādau iṭ niṣedhāya iti ākare spaṣṭam

original: na ca bhāṣye yaṅ lopo 'bebhiditā' ityādāviṭpravṛtyarthamupadeśe 'nudāttādekācaḥ śrūyamāṇādaṅgādityarthe sanīṭpratiṣedho vaktavyaḥ,
analyzed: na ca bhāṣye yaṅ lopaḥ bebhiditā ityādau iṭ pravṛti artham upadeśe n udāttāt eka a caḥ śrūyamāṇāt aṅgāt iti arthe sani iṭ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
bibhitsati iti doṣa upanyāsa vat yaṅ luki doṣāṇām upanyāsena tatra iḍiṣṭaḥ
yaṅ lopa ityādi bhāṣyam tu upakrama upasaṃhāra balena na yaṅ luk viṣayam

original: kiñca, tasya tadviṣayakatve yaṅlope sthānivatvasyevayaṅlukyupāyāpradarśanena nyūnatpattiriti vācyam,
analyzed: kiñca tasya tad viṣayaka tve yaṅ lope sthāniva tvasya iva yaṅlukī upāya apradarśanena nyūna tpattiḥ iti vācyam

original: iḍviṣaye yaṅluko loke 'nabhidhānena chandasi sarvavidhīnāṃ vaikalpikatvena ca tatra doṣānupanyāsenādoṣāt/
analyzed: iṭ viṣaye yaṅ lukaḥ loke na abhidhānena chandasi sarva vidhīnām vaikalpika tvena ca tatra doṣa anupanyāsena adoṣāt

original: anyathā 'ekājgrahaṇaṃ kimartham' iti praśnasya 'uttaratra jāgartyarthamiha vadhyartham' ityuttarasya ca bhāṣye nirālambhanatvapatteḥ/
analyzed: anyathā eka a c grahaṇam kimartham iti praśnasya uttaratra jāgarti artham iha vadhi artham iti uttarasya ca bhāṣye nirālambhana tva patteḥ
na ca ardhadhātuka ākṣipta dhātoḥ eka a caḥ iti viśeṣaṇam
evam ca bibhitsati ityādau uttara khaṇḍasya dhātoḥ eka a c tvam asti eva
uttara khaṇḍe stitva vat
etat ca dayateḥ iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam
evam ca prakṛta bhāṣya asaṅgatiḥ iti vācyam
ākṣepe ākṣiptasya anvaye ca māna abhāvāt

original: aṅgatvaṃ tu viśiṣṭa eveti“ekāco dve“iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam/
analyzed: aṅga tvam tu viśiṣṭe eva iti eka a caḥ dve iti sūtre bhāṣye spaṣṭam
nirūpitam ca tana ādi śeṣe śabda induśekhare
dhātu tvam tu uttara khaṇḍe eva

original: ata eva“ekāco baśo bhaṣ“iti sūtre dhātoravayavasyaikāca iti vaiyadhikaraṇyenānvaye gardhapsiddhiḥ prayojanamuktaṃ bhāṣye,
analyzed: atas eva eka a caḥ ba śaḥ bha ṣ iti sūtre dhātoḥ avayavasya eka a caḥ iti vaiyadhikaraṇyena anvaye gardhap siddhiḥ prayojanam uktam bhāṣye
na tu prasiddham ajarghāḥ iti

original: 'ajarghāḥ, bebhidīti' ityādau śnam śyanādayastu“carkarītaṃ ca“ityasyādādau pāṭhena
analyzed: bebhidi iti ityādau śnam ca iti asyād ādau pāṭhena
yaṅ luk ante gaṇa antara prayukta vikaraṇasya aprāptyā na bhavanti
chāndasa tvāt eva kārya antarāṇām api chandasi dṛṣṭa prayogeṣu adṛṣṭānām abhāvaḥ bodhyaḥ
bhāṣāyām tu tādṛśānām abhāvaḥ eva
śti pśap ādi nirdeśāḥ tu bhavateḥ iraḥ ityādi sūtra stha tad nirdeśa vat na artha sādhakāḥ iti anyatra vistaraḥ
nanu jabho ci
radheḥ ca
na iṭi a liṭi iti eva sūtryatām
kim dvīradhi grahaṇena iti āha
pada gauravāt yogavibhāgaḥ garīyān
prativākyam bhinna vākya artha bodha kalpanena gauravam spaṣṭam eva
parantu bhāṣya asammatā iyam
ṭāṅasiiti sūtrastha bhāṣya viruddhā ca

original: tatra ca inādeśe ikārapratyākhyānaṃ yogavibhāgenaiva kṛtamiti bahavaḥ//
analyzed: tatra ca ina ādeśe ikāra pratyākhyānam yogavibhāgena eva kṛtam iti bahavaḥ
ardha mātrā lāghavena putra utsavam manyante vaiyākaraṇāḥ
e o ṅ ai au c sūtrayoḥ dhvanitā eṣā bhāṣye
tatra aneka pada ghaṭita sūtre prāyas pada lāghava vicāraḥ eva
na tu mātrā lāghava vicāraḥ
apṛktaḥ eka a l iti ādi sūtreṣu bhāṣye dhvanitam

original: tatra hi sūtre algrahaṇahalgrahaṇayorviśeṣavicāre saṃjñāyāṃ halgrahaṇam“ṇyakṣatriya“iti sūtre aṇiñoriti vācyamiti trīṇi padānyalgrahaṇe,
analyzed: tatra hi sūtre a l grahaṇa ha l grahaṇayoḥ viśeṣa vicāre saṃjñāyām ha l grahaṇam ṇi a kṣatriya iti sūtre a ṇ iñoḥ iti vācyam iti trīṇi padāni a l grahaṇe

original: tadekaṃ svādilope halgrahaṇam“ṇya“iti sūtre aṇiñoriti na vācyam,
analyzed: tat ekam su ādi lope ha l grahaṇam ṇyā eti sūtre a ṇ iñoḥ iti na vācyam

original: apṛktasyeti vācyamiti trīṇyeva padānīti nāsti lāghavakṛto viśeṣa ityuktam/
analyzed: apṛktasya iti vācyam iti trīṇi eva padāni iti na asti lāghava kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti uktam

original: “aci śnu“iti sūtre iṇa ityeva siddhe yvoriti saṃmṛdya grahaṇānna pūrveṇeṇgrahaṇam/ tatra
analyzed: a ci śnu iti sūtre i ṇaḥ iti eva siddhe y voḥ iti saṃmṛdya grahaṇāt na pūrveṇa iṇ grahaṇam tatra

original: vibhakti nirdeśe saṃmṛdya grahaṇe ca sārdhāstrisro mātrā iṇ grahaṇe tisro mātrā iti laṇsūtre bhāṣyokteḥ,
analyzed: vibhakti nirdeśe saṃmṛdya grahaṇe ca sārdhāḥ trisraḥ mātrāḥ i ṇ grahaṇe tisraḥ mātrāḥ iti laṇ sūtre bhāṣya ukteḥ
tathā o taḥ śyani iti
sūtre śiti iti na vaktavyam

original: tatrāyamarthaḥ --“ṣṭhivuklamu“iti sūtre 'śitīti na karttavyaṃ bhavati' iti bhāṣye na kevalaṃ mātrālāghavaṃ yāvadayamapyartha iti kaiyaṭokteḥ  #
analyzed: tatra ayam arthaḥ sūtre śiti iti na karttavyam bhavati iti bhāṣye na kevalam mātrā lāghavam yāvat ayam api arthaḥ iti kaiyaṭa ukteḥ
prāyeṇa iti śivam
iti śāstraśeṣa nāmakam tṛtīyam prakaraṇam
iti śrīmat mahā upādhyāya śivabhaṭṭa suta satīgarbha ja nāgojībhaṭṭa kṛtaḥ paribhāṣā induśekharaḥ samāptaḥ
